page.title: 13Accomodation and Bookings.
page.content: There is a small comfortable hotel and a wide range of self catering accomodation,including the Old Light, the Castle Keep,Tibbetts lookout,the Old School-and The Barn and The Quarters which will house small parties.There is also a campsite which can take up to 30 people. Full information can be obtained from the Landmark Trust who deal with all bookings of accomodation and passages. {The Landmark Trust, {Shottesbrooke, {Maidenhead, {Berkshire. {Tel.Littlewick Green(0628-82)5925/3431 The current cost of a return passage on the Polar Bear or the helicopter is Â£27.50 with no reductions for children.
